note:
I live in Portland, OR, with my Beloved Englishman. Mother of @zinn, grandma of Lulu and Freyja. I narrate audiobooks for LibriVox (visit my blog to find links), knit a lot, and sew. I like UK culture, history, linguistics, reading, BBC, The Archers, documentaries, funny stuff, music of many kinds.

Chronic illness: Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
Depression and anxiety under control, mostly.

I like cozy video games, thrillers, “chick lit” (ugh hate that term), and classic movies
